survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes, preferences, and behaviors related to sustainable fashion, including purchasing habits, brand perceptions, and willingness to pay for eco-friendly products.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase clothing or accessories labeled as 'sustainable' or 'eco-friendly'?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 6 times a year)
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for clarity. Ensure options cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase clothing or accessories labeled as 'sustainable' or 'eco-friendly'?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 6 times a year)

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors most influence your decision to buy sustainable fashion? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Influence from social media or influencers
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection but limit to 3 choices to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Other' as an open-text option.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors most influence your decision to buy sustainable fashion? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Influence from social media or influencers

questions.question_text: What is the maximum premium you are willing to pay for sustainable fashion compared to conventional alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges to standardize responses. Include a '0%' option for price-sensitive consumers.

script.question_text: What is the maximum premium you are willing to pay for sustainable fashion compared to conventional alternatives?

questions.question_text: How do you typically verify the sustainability claims of a fashion brand?
questions.client_notes: Include an option for respondents who do not verify claims to capture all behaviors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with 'Other' as an open-text option.

script.question_text: How do you typically verify the sustainability claims of a fashion brand?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing sustainable fashion more often? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of awareness about sustainable brands
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to identify multiple barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Other' as an open-text option.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing sustainable fashion more often? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of awareness about sustainable brands

questions.question_text: How important is it for fashion brands to disclose their supply chain and labor practices?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring importance.

script.question_text: How important is it for fashion brands to disclose their supply chain and labor practices?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you value most in a fashion brand? (Select up to 2)
answer_options: Use of organic or recycled materials
Fair wages and safe working conditions
questions.client_notes: Limit to 2 choices to identify top priorities.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with 'Other' as an open-text option.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you value most in a fashion brand? (Select up to 2)
answer_options: Use of organic or recycled materials
Fair wages and safe working conditions

questions.question_text: Have you ever stopped purchasing from a brand due to concerns about its sustainability or ethical practices?
questions.client_notes: Binary response to gauge consumer activism.

script.question_text: Have you ever stopped purchasing from a brand due to concerns about its sustainability or ethical practices?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please briefly describe what prompted your decision.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Display only if Q8 is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please briefly describe what prompted your decision.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend sustainable fashion brands to friends or family?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend sustainable fashion brands to friends or family?
